# [Interview #1061: SFFWorld: Brandon Sanderson Exclusive Interview, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1061#3)

#### SFFWorld

2. Will we learn more about the character currently known as Hoid in
*Words of Radiance*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes, you will. Watch for a story told at a bar.
